overview: Here we find the legendary mistress of sexpionage, Jane Bond, matching her sex powers against the mighty male sex machine, Thunderballs. To capture the wiley, wet and wild Bond, Thunderballs throws everything he's got against her... there's Odd Joint, a man with the most formidable weapon to ever invade sex slaves, Delicious and Brandy, who know how to tongue-lash a woman like Bond and bring her to her knees in quivering submission! There's also Jane Bond's voluptuous enemy and captive- Octopussy, who uses all her skills in degenerate seduction to lay waste to Jane's superstud organization. Jane Triumphs over all in scene after scene of mind-blowing suspense until the climax when she and Thunderballs engage in the ultimate battle of the sexes. A knock-down, no-holes barred sexual encounter that has to be the wildest, kinkiest, most arousing session ever caught on video.
tagline: Secret Agent 0069 Tackles Her Toughest Foe Yet
title: Jane Bond Meets Thunderballs
